start.state: So we'll be playing strip poker... I hope we have fun.

case.state: Oh, I like strip poker. I'll play!
Let's go for it!
Just so you know, I'm a student model. But I might not be a model student.
Don't ask me to do werid things for you. You know how my gorgeousness attracts attention.
Not judging yet, but who wears fluffy ears to a strip poker game?
Somebody here definitely has stalker potential.
Let's try for ~cards~.
Just ~cards~ for now.
~Cards~, if you please.
Can't get much better than this!
You boys ready to get started?
Oh, I'm sorry. Were we all meant to dress up as slutty fairies?
Is that a camera? I've had some obsessive fans, so I'll need you to blur out my face.
Looks like I'm off to a good start, huh?
I think I'll be okay.
Thank you to whoever invited the cute boys!
Oh, I'm sorry. Were we all meant to dress up as slutty fairies?
Is that a camera? I've had some obsessive fans, so I'll need you to blur out my face.
Looks like I'm off to an okay start, huh?
Eh, I can afford to lose my shoes if needed.
I hope you boys are ready to go as far as I am.
Oh, I'm sorry. Were we all meant to dress up as slutty fairies?
Is that a camera? I've had some obsessive fans, so I'll need you to blur out my face.
Looks like I'm off to a bad start, huh?
Whatever will I do without my shoes?
Who wants to see some socks?
Fair enough.
No big deal.
Let's go, ~name~!
We'll get to the good stuff soon, won't we?
Come on, ~name~.
You better start showing off before I do. I'm a hard act to follow.
Let's see where this goes.
What?!
Ah!
Again?!
You do know that you have to take off a piece, right? It doesn't have to be in pieces.
You're almost done, Aimee.
How tall are you anyway, Futaba? I only ask because of how out-of-scale you look.
Is the girl with the wings some sort of exhibitionist or something?
It's nice to see a familiar face. What did you say your name was again?
As you can tell, I don't intend to lose.
Can't expect much yet, I guess.
Onwards to the next round.
Eh, just some buildup for the fun parts later.
We'll get the easy stuff off you soon enough.
We have to let you breathe, Ochako. Let's get that suit off and let your skin breathe too.
Like, seriously, how many times do we have to do this?
This is about what I expected for the first round.
If you would just put everything you're wearing into a neat pile, that would be great.
At this rate, I might never lose!
Shall we continue?
Next round, please.
I'm wondering if you're planning to lose this game badly or really badly.
Your turn again!
You better be feeling worried.
Very nice.
Stop! I surrender!
Ah!
Not a terrible way to start.
I didn't mean I was giving up. Frankly, I don't think you deserve to see me undressed.
I don't know how you're doing that, but I don't think you should be shooting a gun during a card game!
If only I was in your position, right?
Oh no, someone's losing.
Way to show some skin, hotshot!
Oh-ho, let's see what you got.
No!
Not bad. Not as good as me, maybe, but not bad at all.
You idiot! You could have killed us!

Yeah, let's see what you're hiding under that shirt.
Not bad, not bad.
Would you like to do a photoshoot with me sometime, Pit? We could try a "topless male angels" theme.

Pfft, okay then.
Not bad.
Oh... that's nice.
Whatcha got hidden there, hmm?
Finally decided to strip like a normal person?
How cute.

Ah! What's stopping her from turning the gun on us when she loses? Isn't anybody else worried about this?
H-how did you do that?!
O-oh.
Already?
Unbelievable. Are you trying to set the record for speed losing?
Can you even hit a target that small?
That's n-nice...
Please tell me that was the end of your little rampage.
On one hand, you lost terribly. On the other, you get to have fun!
Sorry I'm not providing much of a show for you, with all my clothes and all.
Don't feel embarrassed if I watch, ~name~.
I don't get tired of winning!
I'm sure lots of boys do this when they see my modelling photos...

Hey, at least you made the game more fun for me.
Let me know if you need some help.

I'm almost a little jealous of you, ~name~.

Just ~cards~ for now.
~Cards~, if you please.
